汉字生僻字，读音一声，基本字义是中国春秋时属鲁，在今山东省汶上县以南。
Chinese characters are rare and uncommon, with a single pronunciation. The basic meaning of Chinese characters is Lu in the Spring and Autumn Period of China, south of Wenshang County, Shandong Province.

鄑字的基本解释

鄑
zī
古地名，中国春秋时属鲁，在今山东省汶上县以南。
中国春秋时纪国邑名，在今山东省昌邑县西北。

鄑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zī］
(1)春秋鲁地。在今山东省汶上县以南一带。
(2)春秋纪邑。在今山东省昌邑县西北。

鄑字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　鄑； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1275第20
【唐韻】卽移切【集韻】【韻會】將支切【正韻】津私切，?音貲。【韻會】邑名。古屬靑州，周屬紀，後入齊。【春秋·莊元年】齊師遷紀、郱、鄑、郚。【註】北海都昌縣西有貲城，卽鄑城也。互詳前郚字註。　又【集韻】宋、魯閒地。【春秋·莊十一年】公敗宋師于鄑。　又【集韻】卽刃切，音晉。義同。　【說文】作?。隸作鄑。譌作?，俗作鄑，?非。

暂无。

鄑
Basic explanation of words
鄑
zī
Ancient place names belonged to Lu in the Spring and Autumn Period of China, south of Wenshang County, Shandong Province.
The name of the country in the Spring and Autumn Period of China is in the northwest of Changyi County, Shandong Province.
鄑
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zī］
(1) Spring and Autumn Lu Land. In the area south of Wenshang County, Shandong Province today.
(2) Chunqiu Jiyi. In today's northwest of Changyi County, Shandong Province.
鄑

[You Ji 2] [Yi Zi Department] 　鄑; Kangxi strokes: 17; page number: page 1275 to 20
[Tang Yun] Move and cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Cut the branch [Zheng Yun] to privately,? Yin Ke. 【Rhyme】The name of the town. It belongs to Qizhou in ancient times, belongs to Zhou Dynasty, and enters Qi afterwards. [Spring and Autumn: First Year of Zhuang] Qi Shi moved to Ji, Qian, Qian and Qian. [Note] There is a city in the west of Duchang County, Beihai, and a city in the city. Mutual details before the word note.　[Jiyun] Song and Lu Xiandi. [Chunqiu·Eleventh Year of Zhuang] Gong defeated Song Shi Yuqian.　 [Ji Yun] Cut with a blade, sound Jin. The same meaning.　[Said the text] for?. Li Zuo Qian. Jiao Zuo?, vulgar as Xian, "non-".
